document.full_text: an aspiring geologist, a hip-hop dancer, a crooner and a trombonist ran the 4x400-meter relay in 3:07.57, an ivy league record, but are aiming higher.
document.title: diverse interests, one goal
lines_and_colors: an aspiring geologist, a hip-hop dancer, a crooner and a trombonist ran the 4x400-meter relay in 3:07.57, an ivy league record, but are aiming higher.
